text: Swinton is a town in the Metropolitan Borough of Rotherham in South Yorkshire, a county in England. 11,701 people lived in Swinton in 2011.http://www.rotherham.gov.uk/downloads/file/9119/swinton_2011_census_ward_profile ==Education== Swinton has a secondary school called Swinton Community School. The school has a sixth form. ==References== Category:Towns in South Yorkshire
title: Swinton, South Yorkshire
